snippet: Instead of backing away from Vice President Joseph Biden Jr.’s support of same-sex marriage, the White House should have embraced it by saying so publicly.
abstract: Editorial holds that instead of backing away from Vice Pres Joseph Biden Jr’s support of same-sex marriage, the White House should have embraced it by saying so publicly; expresses hope that Obama will move forward from the endlessly frustrating hedging and articulate a clear defense of marriage equality.
lead_paragraph: Instead of backing away from Vice President Joseph Biden Jr.’s support of same-sex marriage, the White House should have embraced it by saying so publicly.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
